text.div:
LIVD SARS CoV2 Test Codes

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    50548-7 Respiratory virus DNA+RNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    68993-5 Human RNase P RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    82159-5 Respiratory pathogens DNA and RNA panel - Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
    94306-8 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA panel - Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94307-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N1
    94308-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N2
    94309-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94500-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94502-2 SARS-related coronavirus RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94503-0 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab panel - Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
    94504-8 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab panel - Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94507-1 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
    94508-9 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
    94531-1 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94533-7 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94534-5 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RdRp gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94547-7 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94558-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
    94559-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) ORF1ab region [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94562-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94563-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94564-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94565-9 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
    94640-0 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) S gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94661-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Interpretation] in Serum or Plasma
    94756-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N1
    94757-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N2
    94758-0 SARS-related coronavirus E gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94759-8 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
    94760-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
    94761-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in DBS by Immunoassay
    94762-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94764-8 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) whole genome [Nucleotide sequence] in Isolate by Sequencing
    94845-5 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Saliva (oral fluid) by NAA with probe detection
    95209-3 SARS-CoV+SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
    95406-5 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Nose by NAA with probe detection
    95409-9 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Nose by NAA with probe detection
    95416-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in DBS by Immunoassay
    95423-0 Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) identified in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    95424-8 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Sequencing
